problem_text_cn: 如图,△ABC中,∠ACB=90°,AC=3,BC=4．以A为圆心作圆与BC相切,则该圆的半径为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, ∠ACB = N_0, AC = N_1, BC = N_2. Take A as the center and make a circle tangent to BC, then the radius of the circle is ()
raw_answer: 解:∵∠ACB=90°,即AC⊥BC,∴当圆的半径等于AC=3时,以A为圆心作圆与BC相切．故选:B．
